main.you_may_check_eligibility: You may check your eligibility for the elections by requesting a sign in link. Link will be sent to the email address you have submitted to the Helsinki University Student Registry by 15.9.2015.
main.you_may_request_session_link: Request a sign in link to the email address you have submitted to the Helsinki University Student Registry by 15.9.2015
main.signin_will_commence_at: The service is available starting from:

error.lead: Your sign in link has expired or voting is closed.
error.private_browsing_note: Please check that your browser is not in Private Browsing Mode.

private_browsing_mode.title: You're in Private Browsing Mode
private_browsing_mode.lead: Your browser has "Private Browsing Mode" enabled, which prevents the voting service from functioning.
private_browsing_mode.what_now: Please open the sign in link in a normal browser window.

sign_up.ingress: Give the same e-mail address you have in Universityâ€™s student registry, and we will send you a registration link.
sign_up.password_instructions: Password can be delivered only to the email address that you have in the student registry. You can check which email address you have used on the contact details page in WebOodi.
sign_up.spam_instructions: In case you didn't receive the link, please also check your spam folder.
sign_up.in_case_of_fire: If everything else fails, please contact the election staff of the Student Union vaalit@hyy.fi or +358 50 551 6147.
sign_up.election_dates_explained: Voting is between Tue 15.12.2015 at 9:00 - 20:00 and Wed 16.12.2015 at 9:00 - 17:00.
sign_up.staff_eligibility_note: Permanent staff of the university are not eligible to vote student members in the administration elections.
sign_up.private_browsing_note: Ensure that you do not have Private Browsing Mode enabled when you open the sign in link.
sign_up.link_has_been_sent: Link for sign in has been sent!
sign_up.pls_check_email: Please follow the instructions in your email and sign in.

something_went_wrong.detail: We were unable to send you the link.
something_went_wrong.if_happens_again: If the problem happens again, please contact the election staff of the Student Union vaalit@hyy.fi +358 50 551 6147.
something_went_wrong.pls_explain: Please let us know the technical error message:

errors.not_eligible_in_any_election: You are not eligible in any of the current elections.
errors.session_creation_not_permitted: Voting is closed. You can view the date and time for voting above.

sign_out.ingress: You may close the browser window.

profile.you_are_eligible: You are eligible in the elections of your faculty and department.
profile.in_case_of_problem: If there is a problem with your information, please contact the Student Union.

error.request_a_new_link_and_try_again: Request a new sign in link and try again.

vote-ballot.title: Vote ballot
vote-ballot.ingress: Choose candidate from the list below.
vote-ballot.about-to-change-existing-vote: You are about to change a previously cast vote. Change will be recorded after you click 'Vote'.

vote.if-you-are-eligible-in-others: If you are eligible in multiple elections,
vote.close-window-when-finished: Close the browser window when you have finished.

elections.request_link_please: You can vote after you have requested a sign in link to your email.
elections.you_can_vote_in_the_following: You can vote in the following elections:

empty.no_elections_available: You are not eligible to vote in any elections.

info.ingress: Elections of the student members to the College, the Department Council and the Faculty Council.
info.signin_is_available_at: Signing in is availailable as follows
info.election_dates_explained: between Tue 15.12.2015 at 9:00 - 20:00 and Wed 16.12.2015 at 9:00 - 17:00. Voting will end at Wed 16.12.2015 at 17:05 for those who signed in before Wed 16.12.2015 by 17:00.

contact.in_case_of_fire: In case of a problem, please contact
